description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4iiof","text":"This protocol was created as part of the Information Science Master's program project MWP5 Digital Information Management at the Humboldt University of Berlin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uj2b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6taq","text":"It aims to help a potential user group of the decision-making stakeholders to find the examined dataset for cluster modeling (https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.12743639.v1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":126,"length":47}],"data":{}},{"key":"cq1om","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jar1","text":"Overall five opportunities are both described textually and shown visually. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bpla","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8klq7","text":"In all cases, except the DOI system, the search results can be reduced by applying multiple filters to find the wanted dataset faster and more precisely. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"47080CFBBA7011ECA6F80A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.12743639.v1"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4hfr8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbsfj","text":"Use the DOI to directly access the dataset. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q4m8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ahkn5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"341n2","text":"A DOI is a Digital Object Identifier. That is a Digital Identifier of an Object, not an Identifier of a Digital Object.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1tv8k","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1r5ne","text":"DOIs allow objects to be identified and accessed with certainty. Once DOIs are allocated, they never change for that object (Driven by DOI, n.d.).","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drgm9","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4mkfm","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":38,"offset":54}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":13,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"fu0jd","text":"Driven by DOI. (n.d.). Retrieved March 30, 2022, from https://www.doi.org/driven_by_DOI.html","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"75943716B04311ECBCB00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.doi.org/driven_by_DOI.html"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9brq8","text":"Searching via PubMed Central with the keywords “pubmed literature model” you will hit the data descriptor article as the first result.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":48,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":14}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"54D2C1F0BA6E11ECA134EFA2E2C533EC","url":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"at0li","text":"Use figshare repository where the data is located to find the dataset.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":19}],"data":{}},{"key":"e7nhm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fuj9h","text":"For that, open the repository website and type or paste the keywords pubmed and literature which were selected from the dataset title STS Model of the PubMed Literature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":69,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":80,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":134,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a554","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2u5ls","text":"The results can be filtered and sorted to reduce the amount of found datasets and to find a proper match, e.g. from 7109 to 2437 datasets here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do3bq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e62at","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"odc3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"22uvk","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"05794410B04811ECA2345B9BFC933DB0","url":"https://figshare.com/"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1ae0s","text":"Tip: use a \"+\" sign to reduce the number of found results as it serves the purpose of exact matching.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DEE8ABA0BA6B11ECA134EFA2E2C533EC","height":0,"id":227151,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mp4","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"figshare.mp4","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g74sbrgx7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g74rbrgx7.mp4","width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqeg9","text":"For that, open the DOI system on doi.org, add \"/\" sign and the unique identifier of the dataset (doi: 10.6084/m9.figshare.12743639.v1) or the data descriptor article (doi: 10.1038/s41597-020-00749-y) as shown in the video.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":7}],"data":{}},{"key":"amrqc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k015","text":"You will be navigated to the requested source at once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11akq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"up7m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C4ABE9DCB04011ECBCB00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.doi.org/"}},"1":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4FE17AF0B04211ECA2345B9BFC933DB0","height":0,"id":222011,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mp4","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Neuer Tab - Google Chrome 2022-03-30 17-55-17_Trim.mp4","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g236brgx7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g235brgx7.mp4","width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vlsg","text":"Another opportunity to find the dataset in the DOI system is to use the search field by typing in or pasting the identifier as shown in the video.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":47,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"303g5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"505nl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1FFD3220B04211ECA2345B9BFC933DB0","height":0,"id":222009,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mp4","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Neuer Tab - Google Chrome 2022-03-30 17-52-17.mp4","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g234brgx7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g233brgx7.mp4","width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fso6k","text":"Use Google dataset search which collects a lot of well-curated datasets' metadata if they conform to the standards defined by the schema.org consortium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":21}],"data":{}},{"key":"6p30r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m02f","text":"For that, open the Google dataset search engine and type or paste the keywords pubmed and literature. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":79,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":90,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g3vs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ader","text":"When you type, it will show a dropdown with the best match results that you can open right away as it is shown in the video below. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53sdu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm3uo","text":"If you press the \"enter\" key it will show a page with search results that can be filtered to find a proper dataset.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4587","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8r586","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4762C800B04911ECA2345B9BFC933DB0","url":"https://datasetsearch.research.google.com/"}},"1":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C09A7820B04A11ECA2345B9BFC933DB0","height":0,"id":222049,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mp4","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Dataset Search - Google Chrome 2022-03-30 18-53-44.mp4","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g25cbrgx7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g25bbrgx7.mp4","width":0}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66opd","text":"Use Dimensions Abstracting \u0026 Indexing database where the datasets from figshare are harvested automatically.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":42}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4fh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i137","text":"From the home page access right away the web retrieval system.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":16}],"data":{}},{"key":"cud6m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56edn","text":"Use the keywords pubmed literature in the search bar.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jbip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fkum","text":"Then the results can be filtered by multiple parameters, e.g. type of data, repository name, year, etc. Here the repository name filter was applied  - the number was reduced from 2732 to 30 results.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":148,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mgsa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b12ng","text":"The third hit is the wanted dataset. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dip9t","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djsgq","text":"If searching the keywords \"pubmed literature model\" the hit will appear already on the first page (6th here).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":27,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eknae","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ej9fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B1D63DF0BA5F11EC9E057BF10CB40929","url":"https://www.dimensions.ai/"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0296B260BA6011EC9E057BF10CB40929","url":"https://app.dimensions.ai/discover/data_set"}},"2":{"type":"video","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"37755AA0BA5F11EC9E057BF10CB40929","height":0,"id":227140,"is_video":true,"legend":"","mime":"video/mp4","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen_Recording_(12.04.2022_14-15-27)(1).mp4","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g74fbrgx7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g74ebrgx7.mp4","width":0}}}}
